author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: WHO chief urges end to 'politicisation' of virus
description: The comments come a day after the US president accused the body of being biased in favour of China.
content:
Media captionWorld Health Organization head: 'Do not politicise this virus'
The head of the World Health Organization (WHO) has urged unity, a day after the agency came under fire from US President Donald Trump.
Speaking on Wednesday, Director-General Tedro… [+3146 chars]
